attributes.action: Increase the state pension so that it’s the same as the National minimum wage
attributes.additional_details: It’s unfair that people who have worked their entire lives get pensions of around £7000 when the government says minimum wage is £16k, pensions need to be increased to be equal to the national minimum wage
attributes.background: State Pensions should be equal to the national minimum wage or the london minimum wage. They need to be increased in April and continue to increase so they are all in line with national minimum wage every time it goes up.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition instead: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/302150
